purpose: To educate and guide developers in building and deploying AI agents using LLMs and RAGs
principle: Provides structured tutorials and examples leveraging popular AI frameworks and tools to demonstrate real-world AI agent capabilities
reusability: Includes modular code examples and Jupyter Notebooks that can be adapted for various AI projects
limitations: Primarily educational; not a production-ready solution. Focused on specific AI techniques and may require additional resources for full implementation
name: ai-engineering-hub
description: In-depth tutorials on LLMs, RAGs and real-world AI agent applications.
highlight: Comprehensive tutorials and resources for implementing LLMs and RAGs in practical AI applications
